title: Ice spider

properties.name: description
properties.value: Ice spiders are one of the stronger species of spider. They are seldom killed due to having no drops except for a Wilderness Slayer task.

Ice spiders are one of the stronger species of spider. They are seldom killed due to having no drops except for a Wilderness Slayer task.

They do not appear on the player's minimap.

Contents

  • 1 Locations
  • 2 Drops
    • 2.1 Tertiary
    • 2.2 Wilderness Slayer tertiary

    • 3.1 Gallery (historical)
